text: Jaba allahabata adesa bhayo ki isa. Maile timro sansarama rahane avadhi para gari timila'i aphatira utha'une ra timila'i kaphiraharabata pavitra garnechu. Ra, timro anusarana garneharala'i kaphirahara bhanda saktisali bana'une chu kayamatako dina sam'ma, ani timi sabai ma che'u pharkera a'unechau, ta juna kurama timihara vivada gardathyau, tyasa dina tyasako nirnaya maile nai garnechu
